name: Sega Saturn

regionFree.details: needs Action Replay plugged in to play games from other regions

nativeRgbOutput: with the right cable, all models of the Saturn will output an RGB signal without modification.

multiplayerAdapters.name: Multi-Player Adapter/Multi Terminal 6
multiplayerAdapters.details: Multi Terminal 6 was the name in Japan, and it was known as the Multi-Player Adapter in other regions

playsBurnedDiscs: plays burned discs without modification but requires Action Replay and Pseudo Saturn Kai software
